title: Surely something can be done about this....
body:
I am 2-2 in my promotion series to Gold and I just played my 5th game in the series and I got an afk....just my luck. 
I know this happens to everyone, but something needs to be addressed about afks in the middle of games....it just happened to me at the worst time possible.......I'm really angry at the moment and I hope this doesn't happen to anyone else.
